name: HSP_ACCT_CONS_SP_CVG
description: This table contains Consolidated Self Pay coverage information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the hosp acct record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the coverage payer.

columns.name: PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the coverage plan.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_NUM
columns.description: The unique ID of the subscriber for this coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the subscriber for this coverage.

columns.name: PAYER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the coverage payer.

columns.name: MEMBER_NUM
columns.description: The member ID of the coverage.
